tool.name: Wind Exposition Index
tool.description: This tool calculates the average 'Wind Effect Index' for all directions using an angular step. Like the 'Wind Effect Index' it is a dimensionless index. Values below 1 indicate wind shadowed areas whereas values above 1 indicate areas exposed to wind.

param.name: OLDVER
param.label: Old Version
param.help: use old version for constant wind direction (no acceleration and averaging option)

param.name: PYRAMIDS
param.label: Elevation Averaging
param.help: use more averaged elevations when looking at increasing distances
